Name: GLOBAL:SOFAConventions
Comment: Conventions for IRs with a 1-to-1 correspondence between emitter and receiver. The main application for this convention is to store headphone IRs recorded for each emitter and each ear.

Name: GLOBAL:License
Default: No license provided, ask the author for permission

Name: GLOBAL:RoomType
Comment: Room type is not relevant here

Name: SourcePosition
Comment: Headphones are located at the position of the listener

Name: EmitterPosition
Comment: Reflects the correspondence of each emitter to each receiver

Name: GLOBAL:DatabaseName
Comment: to which HRTF database these data correspond?

Name: GLOBAL:SubjectID
Comment: to which subject from the database these data correspond?

Name: GLOBAL:ProcessingState
Comment: how are the IRs processed (raw, equalized, etc)?

Name: GLOBAL:ListenerDescription
Comment: describe the listener here (human, dummy head, etc)

Name: GLOBAL:EmitterDescription
Comment: describe the drivers of the headphones here
